S.FORM: kakiliman Kelun lankel senayliyase pin cuwan wan tacinsini alsayke nilaculan Kelun lankel senayliyase pin cuwan wan tacinsini alsayke "kamu nu ing ku: luane Wrangell St Elias Glacier Bay Tatshenshini Alsek" u milakuwitay tu nu kanatal asi tung . ( :Kluane Wrangell St Elias Glacier Bay Tatshenshini Alsek) . u eneng nida i amilika atu kanata nu lilis nu yi kung , alaseciya, atu pulitin ke lunpiya a kitidaan. , , . tinisa idaw ku tatelunan nu sulsuldaan a sapilacil atu tatangahan nu sulsuldaan tu aadihan , imahinisa idawku yadahay a kasienawan a adupan atu macelahay a tumay ngabul tabakiay ku ngawa aside tini naming mueneg , , , 1979 amihcaan , pulung nu kanatal u sapasubana u masakaputay nisubelidan a masakaputay wiyni sa apacumuden i kitakit nu helak sananay a nusubelidan a zaysang . u hamin nu ahebal nu pala sa 32,000,000 a ing mu "130,000 acubu nu kuli mikaka aca . 1979 . 32,000,000 (130,000 ) . pakayni nu pulung a kanatal masakaputay 1972 amihcaan idaw ku patecek nuheni tu "sapisikul tu kitakit nu lalangwan atu mucelakay a nisubelitan azaysang nikasasulit" kitakit subelidtan a zaysang mutudu' tu tademaw idawku tatelungan nu lalangawan atu mucelakay a salacul nu nisubelidan a zaysang nu sapamata . 1972 . hina adihay a lalangawan nu nisubelidtan a zaysang pasu malumanay " u nisangaan aluma', nalimaan misang tu cancanan, usulit" masaluyaluyay a lumalumaan, nisubeludan a kitidaan, " nikutkutan a kitidaan" u celak sananay a nisubelitanwiyni sa u micidekay a cancanan atu maudipay nu sisapilaculay nu mucelakay a kitidaan nu wayway , u lala' atu mucelakay nu kitidaan masasuala; "u tahinaay tu a canan nu kitidaan nu cancanan" at uke siy,sapisikul, mucelakay u bangcal nida idaw naming ku sapilacul nu niwci . ( , , ), , , , , . Amilika nayi 1973 a mihcaan 12 abulad 7 ademiad patucek sa tinakawaw masasulit , ina kanatal nucelakay atu lalangawan nu masubeliday a kitidaan kyu idaw ku kasenegan micumud i " kitakit nu tungus singanganay" . 1973 12 7 . 1978 amihcaan 9abulad , tini i huwa sen tun ke lun pi ya sapasubana' acuda nu masakaputay nu kitakit nisubelidan tu zaysang a wiy yun huy sakinatusa milubang , u amilika sayaway misulul tu tusaay a zaysang nu nisubelitan amaala "kitakitzaysang nu singanganay" malacal tu hu te tay ti nu kanatal aaidangan atu takuliyaway aaidangan . 1978 9 . katukuhayda 2024 amihcaan , u amilika idaw ku 26 akitidaan nu aaidangan makaalatu kitakit nu nisubelitan a lalangawan a nisubelitan a xaysang, 12 ku ciit mucelakay nusubelutan , aay mapapulung ku ni subelitan a zaysang . 2024 26 13 ,12 ,1 . sabalihayay a maalaay tini i pu li heng nu mu la wiy ya a kitidaan u milakuwiytay a nisubelitan a zaysang , 2024 amihcaan mapatucek tu . 2024 . ina kanatal idaw 17 ku nialesan a zaysang maalaay atu mipalasul a situngusay . takuliyaway aaidangan nayi 1995 amihcaan katukuh 2003 amihcaan mapacumud " amalawpesay a nisubelidan nu kitakit a zaysang patungusan tu ngangan" nadikudan sa alesan naca , 17 . 1995 2003 . u tabakiay a lanulanu'an nayi 1993 amihcaan katukuh 2007 amihcaan mala amalawpesay tu , nadikudan sa caayaca pusiyawi ; nika i 2010 amihcaan , nu aaidanga u nanum atu mulangaway matulin mahica hakiya , pasayni tu i bayu' kunicelakan milaecus tu nikaudip nu bayu'ay a cacanan , kyu u sapasubana' nu masakaputay lungucan nu amilika a siyhu ya aaidangan mala u amalawpesay tu sa , matulin katukuh ayda . 1993 2007 2010 . u sulsuldaan a aaidangan nu kanatal aaidangan nu kanatal sulsuldaan "Glacier Bay National Park" kitidaan nu pala 330 emang a kubu , paasu masalikelunay mangangiway a buyubuyu'an , u musaungayay a sulsuldaan , udihekuay a hinaudaday a kulakilangan , aadupan nu dadipasan tu ilabuay nu bayu' , u sapalikat tu nu alaseciya nu labuay a dadan . (Glacier Bay National Park) 330 , , , . tiniay aaidangan u nu kitakit celak sananay a nisubelidtan a zaysang kuyni , ina nisubelidtan a zasang u palanida 2500 a kubu , nu kitakit satabakiay a nu kanatal a sasikulan a kitidaan nu cacayay . 2500 . sen yi lay ya se "idaw ku sulit; sen ay li ya se atu senyi li ya se" yanikasapu'cu nu buyubuyu'an , atu nikatatungdu nu buyubuyu'an , bangacal aadihan inayaytu kumahiniay kakapah, sisa mahini kyu u tiding nu buyubuyu'an nu dicem sakatalawan ku talakaw nida , mipuut tu namaka tay pin yangay a nika suemet nu bali a demiad , kyu nikasaupu nu sulda talakaw, kya malasulsuldaan maminkutungdu nu buyu', salengac sa ku tungudu nu buyu' kapah aadihan . ( : ) , , . lankel senayliyase a kanatal nu aaidangan atu sasikulan " kamu nu amilika; Wrangell St. Elias National Park and Preserve" , tini i amilika alaseciy nu kanatal a aidangan , nipatidengan i 1980 a mihcaan , u satabakiay nu amilika aaidangan nu kanatal, 53,321 cubu a kuli ku ahebal malakuwit ku takuliyaway a kanatal nu aaidangan nu enem nu talakaw . ( :Wrangell St. Elias National Park andPreserve) 1980 53,321 . lankel senayliyase a kanatal atu salaadan tu duma nu Kanata keluwani a kanatal nu aaidangan atu niliwanan a lala palecad han nu pulung nu kanatal nimutudu' mala kitakit nu nisubelidan a zaysang . . aaidangan naw bukbuklalan kuyadahay, sisa u tayniay midang cakadayum . . idaw ku tu adadan cayay henay tamakai u ba'ba'tuwan henay nika katukuh iaaidangan , cay kahini acacay u katuuday a labang sa u hikuki kukacawan nuheni. . lankel senayliyase a kanatal nu aaidangan ya ngangan namakayca namaky nu amilika sakatusa a talakw , u talakaw sa 5,489 a depah nu senay liya a buyu . 5,489 . labu nu aaisangan idaw ku tabakiay aadupan , sulsuldaan, balad atu silamalay a buyu' mahini kuy tiniay a kaku nu buyu' . , , .
